zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，短期承压]
zh.content:
当前雪崩币（AVAX/USD）价格为13.3632美元，近期走势表现出震荡整理的特征。当前价格接近24小时低点13.2968，显示出市场短期内承压。若未能有效突破近期高点13.4886，将可能继续在此区间内波动，投资者需密切关注市场情绪变化。

技术指标方面，MACD处于负值区域，表明市场动能偏弱。虽然RSI（相对强弱指数）数据缺失，但结合当前价格走势，市场可能处于超卖状态，短期内有反弹的潜力。短期均线SMA(20)为14.086980，显示出市场在这一水平附近存在一定的阻力。

在支撑和阻力位方面，13.2968美元形成短期支撑，而14.086980美元则是关键阻力位。若价格回落至支撑位，可能会引发短期反弹，投资者可以考虑在支撑位附近设置买入订单，反之，若价格突破阻力位，则需关注进一步上涨的可能性。

综合来看，当前市场处于震荡整理阶段，建议投资者保持谨慎，关注技术指标变化和市场情绪，适时调整交易策略。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The recent price movement of Avalanche (AVAX) against the US Dollar reflects a bearish sentiment, with a current price of 13.3632. The 24-hour change of -0.67% indicates a slight downward pressure. Given the high of 13.4886 and the low of 13.2968 within this time frame, the price action suggests a consolidation phase, as it struggles to maintain above the previous support level. Traders should closely monitor the price behavior around these levels to gauge potential breakout or breakdown scenarios.

From a technical perspective, the SMA(20) at 14.086980 serves as a critical resistance level. If AVAX can regain momentum and cross above this moving average, it may signal a bullish reversal. Conversely, with the MACD currently at -0.26412718, the lack of a clear bullish signal indicates continued selling pressure. The RSI(14) is not available, but if it were to trend below 30, it could suggest oversold conditions, presenting a potential buying opportunity for more risk-tolerant traders.

Support levels are evident at 13.2968, where buying interest may emerge to counteract the bearish trend. A decisive breach below this level could lead to further declines, potentially targeting lower support around 12.50. Conversely, resistance at 14.086980 could potentially act as a ceiling, limiting upside momentum. Traders should exercise caution and consider placing stop-loss orders near the support levels to mitigate risk.

For short-term strategies, traders might consider a range-bound approach, buying near support and selling near resistance. If AVAX manages to break through the 14.086980 resistance, it could trigger a short-term rally, while failure to hold above 13.2968 may prompt further downside. Monitoring volume in conjunction with price movements will also be essential to validate any potential trading signals in the upcoming sessions.
